Type.BattleDialog: Hoh hon. Let’s take care o’ the thingummy our Blue fella asked like the clappers n’ go.
Breathe deep, fellas over there~ This smoke’s anything but bad, so don’t get yer feathers ruffled.
Hohon, my, it’s whole lots more glittering on the inside, me eyes are feasting~
What’s all this now? A bunch o’ these books will do, eh?
That was a whole lotta work~ We’ve got a feast to finish, so let’s get moving, aye?
Oogh, that one stung a li’l… I got dinged good…
Aw bugger, you poor ol’ fella…
Tis a shame, a shame… Poor ol’ pal bought the farm ‘fore the fun started.
This’ll hurt a li’l, I warn ye~ Don’t be a baby about it~
Shoulda been more careful, fella~ Yer friends can’t save yer butt all the time.
Huff… The spicy smoke’s making ye feel good, eh?
Keep on yer toes, laddies.
Looks like lots o’ fun, don’t it~ Let’s warm up a li’l, shall we?
Huuuff… The smoke’s tastin’ spicier than usual. Hohon…
What dozy fellas they were~ I was just startin’ ta have some fun.
Lemme see… One book, two books… …Yup, just the right amount~
Leave me be, pals… I made a blunder an’ let ‘em get me.
This ain’t good… Are we even gonna make it back, eh?
Aren’t they scary folks! Can’t let the fear get us ‘fore they do, though.
Crikey, that smarts… Coulda hurt me sorely.
Huhnh, I thought I did ‘nuff work… There’s still more?
Aye, yeah, that’s the spot. That one felt like a good smack~
Aye, aye. Get it done hell fo’ leather and enjoy the rest o’ our feast.
Aye, I was just gettin’ ready for it.
Why don’t ye go ahead and whatsit on ‘em first.
Hoh hoh hon. Who did they think they were to go whatsit over us.
Well well. Gimme yer books now. We oughta gather ‘em nicely and give ‘em to Blue fella, ye get it?
Lemme take one last draw o’ the pipe…
Aww, shuckles… We can’t dare decline Blue fella’s request…
Things are startin’ to feel a tad bit dangerous, ye alright?
That’s not how ye fend off intruders, now issit? It won’t even tickle that way~
Thought they were pretty deft fellas, but now that I’m lookin’ again… I’m only seein’ daft ho-hum blighters.
Those poor fellas are all but flopped.
Whatsthis? What’re we fightin’ these fellas for.
Heard we're gettin’ books if we wreck ‘em? Blue fella needs ‘em for sumthin’.
Hoh hon. He's gotten into reading, eh?
That’s bizarre, I tell ye… Can’t help it. Gotta get ready for it, eh.
Let’s take it slow~ We'll be sorry if we don't watch it.
These whatsits are seemin’ generous about givin’ books!
Let’s scoot now. We got Blue fella waitin’ for us!
Aw, cut the buzz, ol’ pal! I was just ready ta grab one o’ those books.
Well bugger, these fellas ain’t nothin’ to sneeze at…
What’d those fellas smoke to be so ‘ardy… Didn’t see that comin'…
That’s big trouble… What're we gonna do from ’ere…?
We’re still mighty fine, so don’t get ahead o’ yerselves.
Hoh, shuckles… That’s scary alright. Things ain’t lookin’ fine to me…
Are we really about ta go on after seein’ how they massacred our poor chap?
Whoho, my, that fella just poofed into thin air? Hoh hoh hon!
No worries. I wouldn’t be smilin’ if I couldn’t handle fellas like these.
Nuthin’ for us ta worry ‘bout~
